title: Cadillac Chopsticks, from First Artists Portfolio
marks:
Signed, Dated, Numbered, and Stamped LR: [RM 85-86]
LR: [AP 6/12]
VERSO: [PRINTED AT
description: From a portfolio of six prints by six artists, commissioned by First Bank, Minneapolis. Moskowitz\'s print is based on a 1975 painting of the same title, now in the collection of the Museum of Contemporary Art, Los Angeles.
creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, The Fiduciary Fund
